texts.text:
Welcome!
In this tutorial you will learn the basics of playing the game! Skills will unlock as you progress.
At any time, you can open the menu to check inputs, change options, or leave the area.

Press the menu button to open the menu.
Close it by pressing the same button again.

Use the left thumbstick to move around.
Additionally, you can also use the right stick to turn.

You may feel sick when moving around.
We advise taking regular breaks if you feel queazy.
With practice in VR, you should get used to it.

Jump by pressing the right thumbstick/touchpad or by pushing the thumbstick up.
The longer you press it, the higher you will jump.
In Blade & Sorcery, everything is physical and can be grabbed by pressing the grab button.

You can use ledges or the cracks in-between rocks to climb by pressing and holding the grab button.
Pressing jump whilst at the top of a ledge will allow you to hop up and over the top.
To slide down the rope, grab it and hold the trigger button.
To run, mimic a running motion with your real hands while moving forward with the thumbstick.
You can wall-jump while gripping any surface by looking in the direction you wish to leap and pressing the jump button.
You've acquired magical powers and now you are able to slow time! Try it by pressing the TimeSlow button. To stop the effect, press the TimeSlow button again.

You also now have telekinesis powers to grab objects from afar.
Reach your hand towards the object until you see an interaction icon around it, then press the grab button to grab it with telekinesis.
Now pull the lantern pressing trigger until you grab it. (Alternatively, you can also repel it using the repel button).
You can use the lantern to swing and jump over the gap.
There is a weapon on the ground by the bones. You have 4 holsters, two on your shoulders and two on your hips. To store a weapon, simply drop it onto one of the holsters.
To retrieve your weapon, simply reach into the holster you stored it and press the grab button.
You can easily slide down ziplines thanks to the pulley in your inventory.
To open your inventory, place your hand to your chest and press the spell button.
When the inventory UI is open, you can rotate your wrist as if using a screwdriver to navigate the menu, then press the grab button to select an object.
If you want to store any found items in your inventory, simply drop them on your chest or over your shoulder.
You can never lose your pulley; if you drop it, it will return to your inventory.

There are two enemies guarding the Home. Take them out!
Walking slowly and crouching by pushing down the right thumbstick will allow you to perform stealth kills.

Congratulations, this ends the tutorial! The fire, lightning, and gravity spells are now unlocked. Use the world map by the boat to load levels, and the item spawner books to equip yourself for battle. Good luck!
You can swim with physical motion, thumbsticks, or a combination of both.
The difficulty level of enemies in the dungeon.
How many rooms will be generated in this dungeon.

Check this if you don't want to see any rooms where you are forced to climb in order to reach the exit.
(will reduce the dungeon diversity)
Press at the same time, 'Y' and 'B' to use the external view camera, or 'Y' and 'A' to lock the external view camera
Press at the same time, 'Right Touchpad' and 'Left Trigger'' to use the external view camera, or 'Right Touchpad' and 'Right Trigger' to lock the external view camera
Press at the same time, 'Left Menu' and 'Right Menu' to use the external view camera, or 'Left Menu' and 'Right Trigger' to lock the external view camera
Press at the same time, 'Left B' and 'Right B' to use the external view camera, or 'Left B' and 'Right A' to lock the external view camera
Press at the same time, 'Y' and 'B' to use the external view camera, or 'Y' and 'A' to lock the external view camera
Press at the same time, 'Y' and 'B' to use the external view camera, or 'Y' and 'A' to lock the external view camera
Press 'X' and 'Y' at the same time to take a screenshot
Press 'Right Grip' and 'Right Touchpad' at the same time to take a screenshot
Press 'Left Menu' and 'Left Trigger' at the same time to take a screenshot
Press 'Left A' and 'Left B' at the same time to take a screenshot
Press 'X' and 'Y' at the same time to take a screenshot
Press 'X' and 'Y' at the same time to take a screenshot
Warning: going lower than 0.5 can create some physic issues.

Thank you for supporting us!

Warpfrog is an indie studio that would not have gotten this far without the amazing support of our fans (like you!)

Our full-physics simulator Blade & Sorcery is still in active development and there are some features and gameplay elements missing that will be added in future updates. We are now in the final stretch of development as we aim for full release in 2023 with the completion of Crystal Hunt mode.

For more information on the roadmap, please visit Reddit, Steam, or our Discord.

KospY, Baron and the Warpfrog team
Sandbox is a free-play mode that lets you fight against waves of enemies from the Wave Book.
Choose a destination on the map to travel
Are you sure you want to return to main menu?
Are you sure you want to return to home?
Choose the seed used to generate the level
Are you sure you want to quit the game?
Survive as long as possible against waves of enemies! Grab weapons from your foes, or from the pedestals following each wave!
A big arena to fight in
Please stand straight and press both triggers to calibrate your height
Raise or lower chance to fight tougher opponents
Access all weapons and powers without restriction. Spawn enemies of your choice in arena-based environments or enter the dungeon in sandbox mode.
Progression game mode. Level up your character, buy equipment, and explore dungeons in the search for Crystal Shards and loot.

Select a wave to begin.
Use touchpad/thumbstick to scroll up or down.

For an optimal comfort and game experience make sure your height is well set.

Stand still, relaxed and click "Auto height":

Explore and progress through a semi-procedural dungeon.
Unlock new skills and equipment!
Select your Arena and fight (VRcade only).

Fight waves of foes in an arena to train and improve your skills.
Spoiler alert: All weapons and abilities are unlocked!

The Arena is a small map, best fitted to discover
Blade & Sorcery features!

Please select your game mode
(It can NOT be changed later!)
Are you sure you want to delete your save?
Do you want to play the tutorial?
Hold Use to go to main menu
Hold Alt Use to skip main menu
This hand cannot grab this object
You are about to return home, turn back if you want to stay.

Blade & Sorcery is built for mods and modders, so please enjoy yourself!

 However, we must advise our players that all mods are created independently from Warpfrog, so we cannot vouch for content, quality, or functionality. Warpfrog cannot guarantee technical support for any player-made content.

 Please note, mods can dramatically change the gameplay experience, create performance issues and introduce bugs into the game. If you find a mod has suddenly begun acting strangely it is recommended you remove all mods and start a fresh character save.
Please provide your mod.io e-mail address to link your account
You may receive a verification e-mail from mod.io to link your account
You are about to uninstall the mod:
Are you sure you want to proceed?
The submitted email is not valid!
Sending authentication code to the email address
You can find it in your email, check your inbox or spam folder for a code from mod.io
Mod.io server seems busy at the moment. Please wait.
Not enough disk space free to install this mod.
Your controllers are not supported yet. Inputs may don't work correctly.
For more information about inputs, open the menu by pressing Y and go to the \"controller inputs\" section.
For more information about inputs, open the menu by pressing the left menu button while pressing touchpad center and go to the \"controller inputs\" section.
For more information about inputs, open the menu by pressing the left menu button and go to the \"controller inputs\" section.
For more information about inputs, open the menu by pressing B and go to the \"controller inputs\" section.
For more information about inputs, open the menu by pressing Y and go to the \"controller inputs\" section.

VR HMD not detected!
Only spectator mode is available.

The Arena is a small amphitheater where gladiators do battle.
A great map for new players to hone their skills or fight 1v1.

A temple village lies hidden above a flowing river.
The Canyon has many ropes and bridges connecting both sides.

Perched atop a craggy mountainside, the Citadel is an imposing structure.
Long walkways and verticality create many climbing opportunities in this large map.

Dungeons: EARLY ACCESS
Begin your first Dungeon adventure in the outposts; characterized by its ruined castle-like stone structures and cave systems.

A marketplace at the heart of a medieval village.
A large, open map with lots of opportunities to hurl environmental objects.

The Ruins are now little more than a remnant of some lost civilization.
Two floors offer some verticality to this medium-sized map.

items.name: Baron's Hat
items.description: This does not belong to you!

items.name: Chair
items.description: No description

items.name: Rope
items.description: No description

items.name: Drawer
items.description: No description

items.name: Jar
items.description: No description

items.name: Jug
items.description: No description

items.name: Mug
items.description: No description

items.name: Pillow
items.description: No description

items.name: Plate
items.description: No description

items.name: Health potion
items.description: First concocted by ancient alchemists, this magical elixir will miraculously seal wounds and restore your health.

items.name: Cork
items.description: No description

items.name: Bow
items.description: A staple of combat since ancient times, the bow is a lethal and effective long-range weapon.

items.name: Warbow
items.description: Stern and Steady, the Warbow is used commonly by highly-trained and experienced archers to fend off any foe from afar.

items.name: Arrow
items.description: Usually consisting of a long, fin-stabilized shaft and pointed tip, the arrow is a penetrating projectile used with a bow.

items.name: Piercing Arrow
items.description: A strong weapon enough to pierce chainmail, with a sharp end to embed in the toughest of opponents.

items.name: Quiver
items.description: Often made of leather, wood or fur, the quiver can hold a bundle of arrows.

items.name: Armored Buckler
items.description: The small size and maneuverability of the buckler make it valuable when dealing with light blades.

items.name: Round Buckler
items.description: A bit old, this buckler might save your life... Might!

items.name: Kite Shield
items.description: The kite shield offers maximum protection against arrows and large blades, while its weight can be used for bashing.

items.name: Round Shield
items.description: Small enough to carry but large enough to deflect arrows, the wooden shield provides a good all-around defense.

items.name: Old Lumber Axe
items.description: This old and rusted tool is designed for felling trees, but makes for a dangerous hacking weapon nonetheless.

items.name: Axe
items.description: Benefiting from the strength of its wielder, the axe is an effective brutal hacking and chopping weapon.

items.name: Hatchet
items.description: Effectively used in throwing as well as short-range combat, this hatchet seems very worn. Still effective at slashing and gashing, but is very antique.

items.name: Decimater
items.description: Forged for the Knight who attempted to slay the Golem hidden in the dungeons itself. It is possible he could have succeeded, but deciding that you have this weapon, It is assumed he didn't.

items.name: War Axe
items.description: In amazing condition, this deadly gasher can slice and dice your enemies like butter, along with it looking super stylish! Whoever used this must've taken good care of their tools.

items.name: Northern Axe
items.description: The relatively light axe head offers devastating cutting ability while keeping enemies at polearm length.

items.name: Bardiche
items.description: A descendant of the Dane axe, the cleaver style blade of the bardiche makes it suitable for hacking and slashing.

items.name: Kingslayer Halberd
items.description: Used by Kings and the Royal guards alike, this weapon can land devastating blows, cuts, holes and can be done from all angles. Land strikes from all angles, like the kings that used it to conquer kingdoms!

items.name: War Axe
items.description: A war axe to keep the enemies at bay. Used, but still in able condition, this axe is capable of long-distance power attacks, but not so great if the enemy is smart...

items.name: Rusted Cleaver
items.description: More of a rusted old butcher cleaver than a weapon. It looks like it could break any time now...

items.name: Antic Knife
items.description: Old and worn but still an effective stabber. This dagger has seen its history in assassinations and cut necks.

items.name: Common Dagger
items.description: A favorite of rogues, the sharp tip of the dagger makes it primarily a stabbing and thrusting weapon.

items.name: Fine Dagger
items.description: This dagger has a smooth face yet a slashing edge, proving it was looked after during its use. Gash the necks of victims, or pressure their organs.

items.name: Prince's Decree
items.description: Used by a Prince betrayed by his brother, this stilleto has been uniquely forged by a very talented blacksmith with a purpose to protect the royal figure.

items.name: Boar Spear
items.description: The spearsocket wings prevent this spear from penetrating the flesh too deeply, where the spear might break or get stuck.

items.name: Dual Blade Staff
items.description: This unorthodox weapon can be wielded with one hand of two, with two-bladed ends posing maximum threat.

items.name: Bec De Corbin
items.description: This unorthodox weapon can be wielded with one hand of two, with two-bladed ends posing maximum threat.

items.name: Wooden Club
items.description: More useful to cavemen rather than medieval combat...

items.name: Mallet
items.description: Great for hard-hitting attacks and grounding spikes.

items.name: Shaman Staff
items.description: Once crafted by a talented adventurer who had art in smithing. Since then the adventurer has never been seen since. This was his only weapon left behind.

items.name: Druidic Staff
items.description: Used primarily by Druids, the intricate and elegant design of this wooden staff enhances the potency of the mounted crystal.

items.name: Rapier
items.description: A long, slender blade with a razor-sharp tip makes the rapier optimized to be a thrusting and stabbing weapon.

items.name: Antique Sword
items.description: Used optimally in conjunction with a shield, the short length and thin tip of this weapon make it ideal for thrusting.

items.name: Short Sword
items.description: An ideal thrusting weapon, the pointed tip allows for effective stabbing while the cross-guard design offers some protection.

items.name: Riding Sword
items.description: This elegant weapon has a tapered point for effective thrusting without giving up the width needed for good cuts.

items.name: Reverend Sword
items.description: Chipped and rusting, this sword is still an effective slashing and thrusting weapon.

items.name: Longsword
items.description: Characterized by a long grip and cruciform hilt, the longsword is a lethal and versatile weapon.

items.name: War Sword
items.description: A longer and heavier variant of the Longsword but shorter than a Greatsword.

items.name: La baguette
items.description: Forged in the ovens of a legendary breadmaker known only in folktales as "KospY".

items.name: Wrist Blade
items.description: An unorthodox and exotic weapon, the wrist blade is favored by those who value discretion and concealment above all else.

items.name: Torch
items.description: Used as a light source throughout history, the torch is a stick with an ignited combustible material at one end.

items.name: Blacksmith Hammer
items.description: Intended for use by a blacksmith to shape metal, the heavy metal could still be used to crush bone.

items.name: Trench Mace
items.description: Crude but effective, the mace can be used to stun and batter opponents, knocking them out of the fight.

items.name: Flanged Mace
items.description: The flanged head makes this weapon better suited for denting armor.

items.name: Maul
items.description: With its weight and size, the maul can crush through armor and bones alike.

items.name: Flanged Warmace
items.description: The flanged head makes this weapon especially effective towards battering armored targets and crushing foes.

items.name: Blacksmith Hammer
items.description: A wooden club with three metal, spiked rings, this is bound to hurt.

items.name: Battlemaster Warhammer
items.description: Deadly in its bludgeoning nature, this weapon was once earned by a Battlemaster before he was slain in battle.

items.name: Arrowhead Spear
items.description: Perfected for long-range stabbing. A warrior wielding a sword will have no chance

items.name: Crossguard Stabber
items.description: Used by fearsome front-line warriors to guide their way into battle, this uniquely crafted spear has a bladed edge for effective cutting.

items.name: Hayfork
items.description: It is literally just a hayfork. It has a spiked end, but it is just a hayfork...

items.name: Javelin
items.description: Amazing for throwing, so long as you have the correct stance.

items.name: Staff of the Grandmaster
items.description: Used in countless battles to aid in the protection of the kingdom, this was once used as a weapon of pure power against evil. Since then the grandmaster is frail, I think it is better used in your hands.

items.name: Scolar's Staff
items.description: A wooden club with three metal, spiked rings, this is bound to hurt.

items.name: Wizard's Staff
items.description: Used by arcane wizards, this staff can hold a lot of power to wield in distress.

items.name: Antique Great Sword
items.description: As you wield this gigantic blade, you can hear the previous owner's battlecry resonating through you.

items.name: Claymore
items.description: With its long blade and distinctive style of cross-hilt, the heavy claymore was designed to weild with two hands.

items.name: Greatsword
items.description: Too heavy to be wielded one-handed, the greatsword can be leveraged at the handle for an easier swing.

items.name: Execution Sword
items.description: Although rusted and banged up, this greatblade has seen its past of heads, even its owners'.

items.name: Fine Greatblade
items.description: Finely crafted, this work of craftsmanship handles and slashes well, with a fairly balanced weight.

items.name: Monarchy's Vengence
items.description: "... the Great Monarch lift up his arms, and as his hands guided his surreal weapon, the air itself seemed to be cut in half."

items.name: Kinguard
items.description: Defender of the Throne, Keeper of Kings, Slayer of Betrayers.

items.name: Warbrand
items.description: This used to be a weapon... Or a butcher's knife, it is hard to tell. It may have a few uses left, though.

items.name: Bastard's Reprisal
items.description: While the bastard stood against his own kin, stab wounds around his deformed body, they watched, as his blade hit the ground.

items.name: Seax
items.description: This used to be a weapon of some kind...

items.name: Needle
items.description: This sword is made for Thrust and pierce, it is fierce in front of light armors.

items.name: Poker
items.description: Well... that should do it!

items.name: Throwing Dagger
items.description: A small blade nimble and small enough to be an unnoticed yet deadly throwing weapon.

items.name: Rock
items.description: Nothing better than a primtive way of combat: Rock

items.name: Throwing Dagger Quiver
items.description: A small pouch containing a bundle of throwing daggers.

items.name: Largue Quiver
items.description: Needs Description.

items.name: Small Quiver
items.description: Needs Description.

items.name: Rugged Shirt 1
items.description: A simple shirt, worn to protect the skin from the cold.

items.name: Rugged Shirt 2
items.description: A simple shirt, worn to protect the skin from the cold.

items.name: Rugged Shirt 3
items.description: A simple shirt, worn to protect the skin from the cold.

items.name: Rugged Shirt 4
items.description: A simple shirt, worn to protect the skin from the cold.

items.name: Old Arrow
items.description: An arrow concocted from leftover metal, this arrow, although old and antic, can still prove a good and cheap ranged attack.

items.name: OldBow
items.description: Heavily used and created long ago, this bow still has its uses, but is very worn.

items.name: Skinning Knife
items.description: This has seen better days... At least the rust gives it a serrated edge, perfect for skinning animals.

items.name: Greatsword
items.description: Too heavy to be wielded one-handed, the greatsword can be leveraged at the handle for an easier swing.

items.name: Chalice
items.description: A royal minted cup held by the rich and filled by the poor.

items.name: Copper Coin
items.description: Worth a small penny, given to the poor to charity the rich.

items.name: Gold Coin
items.description: A piece of round metal with a gold glint, this is worth one gold in the shop.

items.name: Pendant
items.description: A small pendant held by the faithful. Sells for a moderate amount at the shop.

items.name: Relic
items.description: A golden trinket made for decoration. Sells for a moderate amount at the shop.

items.name: Statuette
items.description: A small statue of a strong warrior. Worth a small portion of gold at the shop.

items.name: Apple
items.description: Ripe from the tree, ready for eating.

items.name: Burnt Apple
items.description: Hard and rugged, too burnt to eat nicely.

items.name: Cooked Apple
items.description: Cooked perfectly to the core!

items.name: Apple Core
items.description: Ripe from the tree, ready for eating.

items.name: Burnt Apple Core
items.description: Hard and rugged, too burnt to eat nicely.

items.name: Cooked Apple Core
items.description: Cooked perfectly to the core!

items.name: Fork
items.description: A great tool for raking and shoveling.

items.name: Rake
items.description: A tool designed for raking leaves.

items.name: Sickle
items.description: A tool designed for swiping and cutting vegetation!

items.name: Hayfork
items.description: It is literally just a hayfork. It has a spiked end, but it is just a hayfork...

items.name: Hoe
items.description: The prime tool for hoeing the dirt, amazing for farming.

items.name: Pickaxe
items.description: Its prime use isn't just mining stone.

waves.title: Easy
waves.description: Only contains melee enemies, but can you defeat the fortress of bandits?

waves.title: Bandits
waves.description: This isn't a team effort for them it seems.

waves.title: Bandits Melee Only
waves.description: No description

waves.title: Medium
waves.description: The bandits are throwing more classes at your face! Fight mages and berzerkers!

waves.title: Hard
waves.description: A lot more bandits, a lot more challenging.

waves.title: Endless
waves.description: An endless troop of bandits march upon you. Can you take back your land?

waves.title: Endless (Melee Only)
waves.description: An endless troop of bandits march upon you. Can you take back your land?

waves.title: Relentless (Melee Only)
waves.description: The bandits have had enough! They will bombard you!

waves.title: Relentless
waves.description: The bandits have had enough! They will bombard you!

waves.title: Survive
waves.description: Fighting 8 bandits at once? Claim back your land!

waves.title: Circle of Death
waves.description: Your enemies surround you, but they don't have the guts to attack you all at once. They think they're clever to strike one after another... (endless).

waves.title: Wave Chapel
waves.description: Wave that trigger after you get detected in the Chapel room.

waves.title: Wave Library
waves.description: Wave that trigger after you get detected in the Library room.

waves.title: Wave Std 01
waves.description: Wave that trigger after you get detected in a Std Room. No sound alert at the start/end of it.

waves.title: Wave Std 02
waves.description: Wave that trigger after you get detected in a Std Room. No sound alert at the start/end of it.

waves.title: Wave Outpost
waves.description: Wave that trigger after you get detected in the Outpost room.

waves.title: Easy
waves.description: Battle ruthless enemies who have a taste for blood.

waves.title: Gladiators
waves.description: Just like a colosseum!

waves.title: Gladiators Melee Only
waves.description: Just like a colosseum!

waves.title: Medium
waves.description: Gladiators have noticed your strength, and are throwing harder forces towards you!

waves.title: Hard
waves.description: The gladiators are all out for blood. Can you defend yourself?

waves.title: Endless
waves.description: An endless army of gladiators... can you win?

waves.title: Endless (Melee Only)
waves.description: An endless army of gladiators... can you win?

waves.title: Relentless (Melee Only)
waves.description: They keep attacking! Defend against the bloodthirsty gladiators!

waves.title: Relentless
waves.description: They keep attacking! Defend against the bloodthirsty gladiators!

waves.title: Survive
waves.description: They keep coming! Fight 8 Gladiators at once!

waves.title: Easy
waves.description: You have a bounty on your head, can you fight back at knights?

waves.title: Knights
waves.description: Casual brawl with a knight.

waves.title: Knights Melee Only
waves.description: Casual brawl with a knight.

waves.title: Medium
waves.description: The knights are sending more against you! Fight your way to glory!

waves.title: Hard
waves.description: They see you as a big threat! Take them all on!

waves.title: Endless
waves.description: Can you possibly take over a city, against an endless knight troop?

waves.title: Endless (Melee Only)
waves.description: Can you possibly take over a city, against an endless knight troop?

waves.title: Relentless (Melee Only)
waves.description: The Knights are sick of you! Can you defend against them?

waves.title: Relentless
waves.description: The Knights are sick of you! Can you defend against them?

waves.title: Survive
waves.description: Can you survive against 8 knights hunting you at once??

waves.title: Mages
waves.description: Combat against magic wielders!

waves.title: Endless Mages
waves.description: Can you dodge the fireballs?

waves.title: Easy
waves.description: Only contains melee enemies, can you survive against hired thugs?

waves.title: Mercenary
waves.description: This isn't a team effort, they are out for blood.

waves.title: Mercenary Melee Only
waves.description: This isn't a team effort, they are out for blood.

waves.title: Medium
waves.description: You are now hunted by specialist ranged mercenaries!

waves.title: Hard
waves.description: You must have a huge bounty on your head! They're all after you!

waves.title: Endless
waves.description: You've truly pissed someone off. They have hired an unlimited amount of mercenaries against you!

waves.title: Endless (Melee Only)
waves.description: You've truly pissed someone off. They have hired an unlimited amount of mercenaries against you!

waves.title: Relentless (Melee Only)
waves.description: Mercenaries... they're unstoppable. Put an end to them!

waves.title: Relentless
waves.description: Mercenaries... they're unstoppable. Put an end to them!

waves.title: Survive
waves.description: Survive against 8 mercenaries at once! You're worth a pretty penny!

waves.title: Mixed
waves.description: Challenge of the Arena!

waves.title: Mixed Melee
waves.description: Challenge, but a fair game!

waves.title: Battle of 3 Tiers! Melee
waves.description: Fight an endless fight of mixed armored enemies! Melee Only!

waves.title: Battle of 3 Tiers!
waves.description: Fight an endless fight of mixed armored enemies!

waves.title: Training
waves.description: One enemy only.

waves.title: Progressive 1v1
waves.description: Fight one-on-one, where it will get progressively harder to fight! (not endless).

waves.title: Training
waves.description: One enemy at a time, for you to learn the overall mechanics and learn your unique playstyle.

waves.title: Learning
waves.description: Two Enemies at a time. Will start to introduce more enemy types.

waves.title: Advancing
waves.description: Three max now. Even more classes added.

waves.title: Bandits Vs Knights
waves.description: Pillage all that you can!

waves.title: Gladiators vs Bandits
waves.description: You fight in the arena a lot... you can deal with bandits surely.

waves.title: Gladiators vs Knights
waves.description: It is time to fight back for your freedom against the city!

waves.title: Knights Vs Bandits
waves.description: Take back what they have stolen from you!
